# Plumber Webinar

<!--
Screenshot of title slide
-->

This webinar highlights using [Plumber](https://www.rplumber.io/) to solve a
common set of data problems while also highlighting features added in version
1.0.0.

## Environment

This project uses [`renv`](https://rstudio.github.io/renv/index.html) for
package management. In order to install and use required packages, execute the
following:

``` r
renv::restore()
```
